rule: If the word cannot be tagged with any of the listed part of speech tags, the output must not be the string "Unknown".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of the tag "NN," which aligns with one of the part-of-speech tags listed in the description. The task requires only returning the tag for the word's part of speech or "Unknown"/"CantAnswer" when applicable. The output does not contain additional information or formatting issues that would violate the instructions, and it does not include content that would require knowing the input. Therefore, the output complies with the task description as it provides only the part-of-speech tag.

OK
